alert.note: Alert for Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 9:23PM PST until January 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST SUNDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow, sleet, and freezing rain. Very cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph, mainly near the Columbia Gorge. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills and Northern Oregon Cascades. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 10 AM PST Sunday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult due to snow and ice covered roads. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 15 to 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. If travelling, make sure you have a full tank of gas and a winter survival kit, hat, and gloves. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; Northern Oregon Cascades
